```{r, include = FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(XML)

url <- "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1G_SoWUquak6oD-b2L3L-XB7cF97UAGb8PPyVg3r0Lts/"
suppressWarnings({
  doc <- paste(readLines(url), collapse=" ")
})
if(nchar(doc) == 0) stop("No content found")
tables <- getNodeSet(htmlParse(doc), "//table")
sips <- readHTMLTable(tables[[1]], header=TRUE, 
                     stringsAsFactors=FALSE, 
                     as.data.frame=TRUE)

read_row <- function(row) {
  hm <- sips[row, 2]
  
  sessions <- sips[row, 3:26] %>%
    unlist() %>%
    unname()
  
  sessions[sessions != "" & sessions != "EDGE OF THE WORLD. TURN BACK."] %>%
    paste0(collapse = "</li>\n\n<li><input type='checkbox'> ") %>%
    paste0("<h3>", hm, "</h3>\n\n", 
           "<ul><li><input type='checkbox'> ", ., "</li></ul>")
}

```
